title: Phobetron: Biblical Prophecy & Celestial Pattern Detection System
description: Phobetron is the world's first integration of biblical prophecy analysis, NASA-grade astronomical precision tracking, and machine learning correlation models for seismos (σεισμός) disasters. The system combines real-time 3D solar system visualization with 17 moon systems, 4 trained ML models achieving 75%+ accuracy, Hebrew calendar integration, and biblical prophecy pattern detection. Built with FastAPI, React, Three.js, TensorFlow, and PostgreSQL 16.
notes: This software represents the first integration of biblical eschatology with modern machine learning and astronomical tracking. The system uses Greek biblical terminology (σεισμός - seismos) to correlate celestial events with natural disasters. Production deployment includes 4 ML models (earthquake clusters 89%, volcanic eruptions 78%, hurricane formation 81%, tsunami risk 84% accuracy), real-time 3D visualization with 17 moon systems, and comprehensive biblical prophecy database with 40+ prophecies. Live demo available at https://phobetronwebapp-production-d69a.up.railway.app
references: Luke 21:11 - Signs in sun, moon and stars
Revelation 6:12 - Great earthquake and celestial signs
